title: Social Media Ads Expert with Google ads experience
job_overview:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Media Buyer / Pay-Per-Click (PPC) Ads Expert to join our team at Brandlume. As a PPC Ads Expert, you will be responsible for managing and optimizing paid advertising campaigns to drive results for our clients across various digital platforms.

Responsibilities:

Develop and implement effective PPC strategies to achieve client objectives, including lead generation, conversion optimization, and ROI maximization.
Manage and optimize paid advertising campaigns on platforms such as Facebook / Instagram Ads, LinkedIn Ads, and others.
Knowledgeable in Google ads is a plus.
Conduct keyword research, ad copywriting, and audience targeting to ensure maximum campaign performance.
Monitor and analyze campaign performance metrics, such as click-through rate (CTR), conversion rate, and cost per acquisition (CPA), and make data-driven optimizations.
Stay informed about industry trends, algorithm updates, and best practices in PPC advertising to drive continuous improvement.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including account managers, designers, and developers, to ensure alignment and integration of PPC campaigns with overall marketing strategies.
Provide regular reports and insights to clients on campaign performance and recommendations for optimization.
Communicate with the client thru meetings the reports and updates on the campaigns
Must have experience working as PPC or Media buyer for a digital marketing agency


Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in marketing, advertising, or a related field.
Minimum of 3 years of experience in media buying and PPC advertising, preferably in a digital marketing agency or related industry.
Proven track record of managing successful PPC campaigns and achieving measurable results.
In-depth knowledge of PPC platforms, including Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and LinkedIn Ads, as well as advertising tools and analytics platforms.
Strong analytical skills, with the ability to interpret data, draw insights, and make data-driven decisions.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams and communicate complex ideas to clients.
Google Ads certification and other relevant certifications (e.g., Facebook Blueprint) are a plus.


Benefits:

Competitive salary and benefits package.
Flexible remote work environment.
Opportunities for professional development and growth.
Dynamic and collaborative team culture.
If you are a results-driven PPC expert with a passion for digital advertising and a track record of delivering exceptional results for clients, we want to hear from you! Join us at Brandlume and help us empower brands to succeed in the digital marketplace.

How to Apply:
Submit your application form to: Upgrade to see actual info and share your resume and cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you are the ideal candidate for this position. Be sure to include "OLJ - Media Buyer / PPC Expert Application - [Full Name]" in the subject line. We look forward to hearing from you!
